column1: Very nice family guesthouse. Great hosts and extremely clean rooms. 30 mins walking distance to Registan. Great value
This is a relatively new hotel close to the old town of Samarkand. It is family run and the family is very nice. We came here due to a misunderstanding in a booking at another hotel
column2: so expectations were not very high. But the Hotel (which is btw named after the owners daughter) and its owner were a pleasant surprise.

column1: The rooms are light and clean and have a very good air conditioning. Beds are a bit hard
column2: but that seems to be something that is prevalent in Uzbekistan.
but it is only cold food. The area for breakfast is very clean and can be used by guests at any time.

column1: The service level of the owners is very high. They offered us to clean our clothes and returned them not only clean
There is a very nice terrace on the top of the Hotel. We didn‚Äôt manage to use it as we were there at end of March and it was a bit cold.

column2: peaceful location.  The rooms are very cozy.  The bed is clean and comfortable.  The towels are the softest.  It feels like everything is done with care for the hotel guests.  Breakfasts are delicious and filling.  Registan and other attractions are nearby.  Very welcoming and friendly staff
column3: ready to help.  There is a terrace on the roof with views of the city.  On warm summer days
column4: you can spend evenings on the terrace

column1: I definitely recommend choosing this hotel.  Especially for those who value silence
